tables.name: quasar_atom_pro_lp_transactions
tables.description: This table contains a comprehensive list of transactions related to liquidity pool actions within the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into the flow of assets and the dynamics of liquidity provision.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Address of the sender performing the liquidity pool action.

columns.name: pool_id
columns.description: Identifier for the liquidity pool involved in the transaction.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp when the transaction was included in a block within the Cosmos blockchain.

columns.name: type
columns.description: Type of liquidity pool action, such as deposit or withdraw.

columns.name: raw_tokens
columns.description: Total amount of tokens involved in the transaction, without converting them to base assets.

columns.name: base_asset
columns.description: Base asset of the transaction, often a stablecoin or a widely traded cryptocurrency.

columns.name: base_amount
columns.description: Amount of the base asset involved in the transaction.

columns.name: base_amount_usd
columns.description: Amount of the base asset involved in the transaction, converted to US dollars.

columns.name: base_price
columns.description: Current market price of the base asset.

columns.name: asset
columns.description: Asset involved in the transaction, which can be a cryptocurrency or a token.

columns.name: asset_amount_usd
columns.description: Amount of the asset involved in the transaction, converted to US dollars.

columns.name: asset_price
columns.description: Current market price of the asset.

tables.name: quasar_blocks
tables.description: This table contains information about blocks in the Cosmos blockchain ecosystem, providing insights into block heights, timestamps, and other relevant metrics.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in the blockchain, indicating its position in the chain.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was created, measured in seconds since the Unix epoch.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the Cosmos blockchain network, distinguishing it from other networks.

columns.name: proposer_address
columns.description: The address of the validator that proposed the block for inclusion in the blockchain.

columns.name: validators_hash
columns.description: A hash of the validators that participated in the block's validation process.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block data was ingested into the system, measured in seconds since the Unix epoch.

columns.name: messages_bytes
columns.description: The total number of bytes in all the messages (transactions) included in the block.

columns.name: tx_count
columns.description: The total number of transactions (messages) included in the block.

tables.name: quasar_event_attributes
tables.description: This table provides information about blockchain events from the Cosmos ecosystem, including metadata and attribute values. It is useful for analyzing and understanding event data in the Cosmos network.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in the blockchain

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The ID of the blockchain

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: The ID of the transaction

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: The index of the event within the transaction

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: The type of the event

columns.name: event_source
columns.description: The source of the event

columns.name: attribute_key
columns.description: The key of the attribute value

columns.name: attribute_value
columns.description: The value of the attribute

columns.name: attribute_index
columns.description: The index of the attribute within the event

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the data was ingested

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was created

tables.name: quasar_message_event_attributes
tables.description: This table provides detailed information about message events from various blockchains in the Cosmos ecosystem, offering insights into transaction activity and network behavior.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the message event was recorded.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the blockchain on which the message event occurred.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the transaction in which the message event occurred.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within which the event was recorded.

columns.name: event_index
columns.description: The index of the event within the message.

columns.name: event_type
columns.description: The type of event that occurred.

columns.name: attribute_key
columns.description: The key associated with an attribute of the message event.

columns.name: attribute_value
columns.description: The value associated with an attribute of the message event.

columns.name: attribute_index
columns.description: The index of the attribute within the message event.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the message event data was ingested into the database.

tables.name: quasar_osmo_pro_lp_transactions
tables.description: This table contains a record of all Osmosis liquidity pool transactions, providing insights into the Cosmos ecosystem's liquidity pool activities. It includes information about the transactions, such as sender, pool ID, and asset involved.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: Unique identifier of the blockchain transaction, typically a hash value.

columns.name: sender
columns.description: Address of the account that initiated the transaction.

columns.name: pool_id
columns.description: Identifier of the liquidity pool involved in the transaction.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: Timestamp at which the transaction was included in a block on the blockchain.

columns.name: type
columns.description: Type of transaction, indicating the operation performed on the liquidity pool.

columns.name: raw_tokens
columns.description: Number of tokens involved in the transaction, in their raw form.

columns.name: osmo_asset
columns.description: Identifier of the Osmosis asset involved in the transaction.

columns.name: osmo_amount
columns.description: Amount of Osmosis asset transferred or exchanged during the transaction.

columns.name: osmo_amount_usd
columns.description: Amount of Osmosis asset in USD, calculated based on the current market price.

columns.name: osmo_price
columns.description: Current market price of Osmosis asset, used for calculating the asset value.

columns.name: asset
columns.description: Identifier of the asset involved in the transaction, other than Osmosis.

columns.name: asset_amount
columns.description: Amount of the non-Osmosis asset transferred or exchanged during the transaction.

columns.name: asset_amount_usd
columns.description: Amount of the non-Osmosis asset in USD, calculated based on the current market price.

columns.name: asset_price
columns.description: Current market price of the non-Osmosis asset, used for calculating the asset value.

tables.name: quasar_transactions
tables.description: Cosmos Ecosystem Blockchain Transactions. This table contains information about all transactions occurring across various chains in the Cosmos ecosystem.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The block height at which the transaction was processed.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The ID of the blockchain on which the transaction occurred.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: A unique identifier for the transaction.

columns.name: tx_info
columns.description: Additional information about the transaction.

columns.name: tx_log_message
columns.description: A log message related to the transaction.

columns.name: memo
columns.description: A memo or note associated with the transaction.

columns.name: fee
columns.description: The fee paid for the transaction.

columns.name: tx_code
columns.description: The transaction code or result.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within a block.

columns.name: gas_used
columns.description: The amount of gas used during the transaction.

columns.name: gas_wanted
columns.description: The amount of gas requested for the transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp at which the transaction was ingested.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version of the schema used to process the transaction.

columns.name: fee_coins
columns.description: The coins used to pay the transaction fee.

columns.name: fee_granter
columns.description: The account that granted the transaction fee.

columns.name: fee_payer
columns.description: The account that paid the transaction fee.

columns.name: gas_limit
columns.description: The maximum amount of gas the transaction was allowed to use.

columns.name: single_sign_mode
columns.description: Whether the transaction was processed in single sign mode.

columns.name: multi_sign_json
columns.description: JSON data related to multi- sign transactions.

columns.name: timeout_height
columns.description: The block height at which the transaction was timed out.

tables.name: quasar_tx_messages
tables.description: This table contains a collection of transactions from various blockchains within the Cosmos ecosystem, providing insights into the blockchain activity over time.

columns.name: block_height
columns.description: The height of the block in which the transaction was included.

columns.name: chain_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the blockchain on which the transaction occurred.

columns.name: tx_id
columns.description: The unique identifier of the transaction.

columns.name: tx_index
columns.description: The index of the transaction within the block.

columns.name: message_index
columns.description: The index of the message within the transaction.

columns.name: message_type
columns.description: The type of message within the transaction.

columns.name: message
columns.description: The actual message within the transaction.

columns.name: ingestion_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the transaction data was ingested into the database.

columns.name: schema_version
columns.description: The version of the schema used to store the transaction data.

columns.name: block_timestamp
columns.description: The timestamp when the block was created, which includes the transaction.
